about.title: About Ipsum Dolor Sit Amet
about.content: We are passionate about introducing guests from all over the world to Kateka, our five-star home. We would love for you to come and discover a wilderness meets wellness experience where our love for hospitality is evident. Whether it's the wildlife you encounter, the people you meet during your stay, the facilities on offer or simply all of it, our hope for every guest is to leave feeling like members of the family and not wanting to leave!

instructions: Fly into OR Tambo International Airport, Johannesburg
Take connecting flight to Hoedspruit Airport (45 minutes)
Road transfer to Kateka (30 minutes drive)

premiumDates.title: Premium DATES (20 Dec - 1 Jan)
premiumDates.description: Rates plus additional 50,000 ZAR will be charged, per night, during this period.

premiumDates.title: Premium DATES (20 Dec - 1 Jan)
premiumDates.description: Rates plus additional 52,500 ZAR will be charged, per night, during this period.

rates-additional-info.title: INCLUSIONS
rates-additional-info.content: All meals and beverages (excluding premium wines and spirits), accommodation in luxury suites, daily game drives with professional guides, spa treatments, airport transfers, and all conservation fees.

rates-additional-info.title: EXCLUSIONS
rates-additional-info.content: International flights, travel insurance, premium alcoholic beverages, personal expenses, gratuities, and any activities not specified in the inclusions.

rates-additional-info.title: TERMS & CONDITIONS
rates-additional-info.content: All rates are subject to availability and may change without notice. A 50% deposit is required to secure your booking. Full payment is due 30 days prior to arrival. Cancellation fees apply as per our cancellation policy.

questions.question: What is included in my stay?
answer: All meals and beverages (excluding premium wines and spirits)
Daily game drives with professional guides

questions.question: What should I pack for my safari?
answer: Light, neutral-colored clothing for game drives
Warm layers for early morning and evening drives
Sun hat, sunglasses, and high SPF sunscreen

questions.question: Do you cater to dietary requirements?
questions.answer: Yes, we accommodate all dietary requirements including vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, and other special dietary needs. Please inform us of any requirements when making your booking.

questions.question: What is your cancellation policy?
answer: Cancellations more than 60 days prior: Full refund minus 10% admin fee
Cancellations less than 30 days: No refund

questions.question: When is the best time to visit?
questions.answer: The best time to visit depends on your preferences. Dry season (May-September) offers excellent game viewing, while wet season (October-April) brings lush landscapes and bird watching opportunities.

questions.question: Do you accept children?
questions.answer: Yes, we welcome children of all ages. Children under 5 stay free, and we offer special family-friendly activities and accommodations. Please note that some game drive activities have age restrictions for safety reasons.

questions.question: What animals can I expect to see?
answer: The Big Five: Lion, Leopard, Elephant, Buffalo, and Rhino
Antelope species: Impala, Kudu, Waterbuck, and Nyala
Over 300 bird species including African Fish Eagle and Lilac-breasted Roller
Hippos and crocodiles in the river systems

questions.question: How many game drives are included?
questions.answer: We include two game drives per day - an early morning drive (sunrise) and an afternoon drive (sunset). Additional drives can be arranged at an extra cost.

questions.question: Are the game drives suitable for all ages?
questions.answer: Most game drives are suitable for all ages, however children under 6 years may not be permitted on certain specialized drives for safety reasons. We offer family-friendly vehicle options and shorter drive durations for younger guests.

questions.question: What wellness treatments are available?
answer: Outdoor wellness activities including bush walks

questions.question: Do I need to book spa treatments in advance?
questions.answer: We recommend booking spa treatments upon arrival or at least 24 hours in advance to ensure availability. Popular treatments and sunset yoga sessions tend to book up quickly.

questions.question: Are wellness activities included in the rate?
questions.answer: Basic wellness activities like yoga classes and fitness center access are included. Premium spa treatments, private wellness sessions, and specialized therapies are available at additional cost.

dining-options.title: Fine Dining Restaurant
dining-options.description: Experience exquisite cuisine in our elegant restaurant overlooking the African wilderness. Our chef creates memorable dishes using the finest local and international ingredients.

dining-options.title: Bush Dining Experience
dining-options.description: Dine under the vast African sky with our unique bush dining experience. Enjoy traditional flavors while listening to the sounds of the wilderness.

dining-options.title: Poolside Bar & Grill
dining-options.description: Relax by the pool with light meals, refreshing drinks, and stunning views. Perfect for a casual lunch or sunset cocktails.

contact-info.title: GENERAL CONTACT
contact-info.additionalInfo: Our team is available 24/7 to assist with your safari and wellness experience enquiries.

contact-form-section.title: Stay With Us
contact-form-section.description: Ready to experience the perfect blend of safari adventure and wellness retreat? Get in touch with us to plan your unforgettable journey at Kateka.
